deck.title: 24/7 Learning isjust a click away
deck.desc: Enjoy learning Chinese in the most fun and easiest way possible. Anytime, Anywhere, TutorMing.

deck.title: TutorGlassThe Future of Learning
deck.desc: Enjoy learning Chinese in the most fun and easiest way possible. Anytime, Anywhere, TutorMing.

deck.title: Great education partners make it possible!

why.title: Join over 1 billion other people in speaking the language
why.desc: Learn Chinese to connect better with friends, colleagues, or business contacts.

why.title: Open yourself up more job opportunities
why.desc: China is the world's second-largest economic power, as well as one of the top trade partners of the world. Learn Chinese to give yourself an extra competitive edge.

why.title: Expose yourself to a new culture
why.desc: China has one of the oldest and richest heritages of the world. Learning Chinese will help you better understand its people, customs, and traditions.

advantages.title: AnytimeAnywhere
advantages.desc: Whether you are at home, on the go, out of town, using a laptop or tablet... As long as you have Internet, we are here to teach. Doesn't matter if you are an early bird or night owl, we habe lessons for you.

advantages.title: IndividualizedAttention
advantages.desc: The user experience is at the heart of everything we do. Our sophisticated technology platform ensures that you are matched with the best consultants and course materials to suit you.

advantages.title: TechnologyBased
advantages.desc: We believe that education should be innovative. Our online classroom features an integrated whiteboard, instant message, quality video and sould - all the benefits of being in a physical classroom.

advantages.title: CertifiedConsultants
advantages.desc: Quality instruction is important to us. Our world-class consultants are all selectively chosen native Chinese speakers, who then undergo specific training with TutorMing. Each one of them is certified.

advantages.title: PrivacyProtection
advantages.desc: We offer a one-way webcam system. You can see our consultants, but our consultant cannot see your, so ylu can try speaking Chinese with confidence.

easy.title: Get started with TutorMing
easy.desc: Register! Tell us a bit about yourself, your interests, and why you want to learn Chinese.

easy.title: Schedule a demo class
easy.desc: Our super helpful team will help you arrange a demo class with one of our best Chinese consultants, so you can experience what learning with TutorMing is like!

easy.title: Discuss pricing plans and options
easy.desc: Our product specialists will help you choose a fluency package based on your unique needs and requirements.
